FuncDef: The display npcc configuration command displays the configuration of the NPCC function. The display npcc configuration command displays the configuration of the NPCC function. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
